hero.title:
Take control of your health,
detect early, act early
hero.subtitle: Kachefi, your pre-screening and awareness assistant to detect cancer risks and act quickly.

mission.title: About Our Mission
mission.description: At Kachefi, our mission is to support you in protecting your health with a simple and accessible tool. We firmly believe that prevention and early detection are key to reducing cancer risks. By raising public awareness about the first warning signs and facilitating access to reliable information, we want to encourage everyone to make informed decisions to preserve their well-being. Kechefi offers personalized recommendations and prevention paths, allowing you to act quickly and maximize the chances of early detection and treatment.

content.description: Quickly assess your cancer risk using a simple questionnaire.

more-questions.title: Still have questions?
more-questions.description: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Don't hesitate to chat with our friendly team.

content.question: How does the pre-screening questionnaire work?
content.answer: The Kechefi pre-screening questionnaire is designed to quickly assess your potential cancer risks based on scientific data. You answer a series of simple questions regarding your medical history, lifestyle, and any symptoms. At the end, you receive a personalized assessment with recommendations tailored to your profile.

content.question: Does Kechefi replace a medical consultation?
content.answer: No, Kechefi does not replace a consultation with a doctor. Our application provides information and recommendations based on your answers, but it can in no way diagnose cancer. If your results indicate a high risk, we recommend that you consult a healthcare professional for a thorough diagnosis.

content.question: Is my personal data protected?
content.answer: Yes, the confidentiality of your data is a priority for us. All the information you share in the application is strictly confidential and protected according to international data security standards. They will never be shared with third parties without your consent.

content.question: How does the pre-screening questionnaire work?
content.answer: The Kechefi pre-screening questionnaire is designed to quickly assess your potential cancer risks based on scientific data. You answer a series of simple questions regarding your medical history, lifestyle, and any symptoms. At the end, you receive a personalized assessment with recommendations tailored to your profile.

content.question: Does Kechefi replace a medical consultation?
content.answer: No, Kechefi does not replace a consultation with a doctor. Our application provides information and recommendations based on your answers, but it can in no way diagnose cancer. If your results indicate a high risk, we recommend that you consult a healthcare professional for a thorough diagnosis.

content.question: Is the application free?
content.answer: Yes, the Kechefi application is available for free to all users. Some advanced features for health professionals may require a subscription, but the basic tools for the public, including the pre-screening questionnaire and recommendations, are completely free.

content.question: Does Kechefi cover all types of cancer?
content.answer: Currently, Kechefi is focused on the most common cancers, such as breast, prostate, colorectal, and cervical cancer. We are continually working to expand the scope of the application to include other types of cancers and provide more comprehensive coverage.

content.question: How can I access healthcare professionals via Kechefi?
content.answer: Kechefi offers a feature for healthcare professionals subscribed to our platform. You can consult their opinions on cancer risks and ask questions via the application. However, these interactions do not replace an in-person consultation.

content.question: Is Kechefi compatible with all phones?
content.answer: Yes, Kechefi is available on Android and iOS devices, and it is compatible with most phones and tablets. Simply download the application from Google Play or the App Store to start using it.

content.question: Can I share my results with my doctor?
content.answer: Absolutely! You can easily export your results as a PDF report and share them with your doctor to discuss the next steps during your consultation
